title: Man Conveying Daimeo Letter, from a photography album with images of Japan
marks:
Inscription

LLC, in negative: [K 31 A Man conve
description: striding young man wearing white loincloth, white headband and plant fiber sandals, carrying a flat packet attached to a bamboo pole held across his shoulder; man has tattoos over his torso, upper arms, buttocks, and upper thighs
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
